bioghist.p: Sallie Sherrerd Bonnell Houston was married to Henry Howard Houston. The couple had six children, Cornelia Bonnell, Henry Howard Jr., Eleanor Anna, Sallie Bonnell, Samuel Frederic and Gertrude. Houston gave substantial amounts for the establishment of colored churches and for the education of the underprivileged. The Houstons also gave a gift to the University of Pennsylvania for Howard Houston Hall and its maintenance.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of Sallie S.B. Houston. Materials in the collection include: correspondence, much of it with her daughters Sallie B.H. Henry and Gertrude H. Woodward; financial records including summaries of stock purchases and dividends, and receipts; and household accounts. The collection also includes materials related to Houston's gift of Howard Houston Hall at the University of Pennsylvania, and subsequent correspondence on the continued maintenance of the building.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
